get.description:
Get a list of Lianlian Pay system generated events. If no events, empty list will be returned

Return type is List<`Event`>

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: Event topic defined in Lianlian Pay's system.

parameters.name: pageNum
parameters.description: If nonzero, skip this number of results before returning data. Used with `pageSize` to provide pagination for large datasets.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: If nonzero, return no more than this number of results. Used with `pageNum` to provide pagination for large datasets. Unless otherwise specified, the maximum number of records that can be returned from an API call is 20 records

get.description:
Get a Lianlian Pay system generated event by `eventId`

Return type is `Event` object

event.title: Event
event.description: Event object generated during business processing in Lianlian Pay's system.

id.description: Event id in Lianlian Pay's system

type.description:
Object type related to this event. One of:

| type | description |
|------|-------------|
| bill | Bill object defined in Lianlina Pay's system. Get bill details by requesting `Get Bill` API|
| funding| Funding object defined in Lianlian Pay's system. Get bill details by requesting `Get Funding` API|
|fxinstruct|exchange object Get More information use `Get FxInstruct` API|
|tuitionEvidence|tuitionevidence object defined use Get TuitionEvidence API get the lastest TuitionEvidence Object information.|

event-topic-enum.title: Event Topic Enumeration
event-topic-enum.description:
Event topics defined in Lianlian Pay's system.

| Topic | Description |
|--------|------------|
| funding.funded | Bill funded,  Return data `BillFundingTrans` object.  |
| TuitionEvidence.approved |当提交申请的留学材料被审核通过时,审核通过后可发送汇兑指令 Return data `TuitionInfo` object. |
| TuitionEvidence.reject |当提交申请的留学材料被审核拒绝,需重新提交, Return data `TuitionInfo` object. |
| bill.expired | No funding after bill expiration date. Return data `BillPayInfo` object. |
| fxinstruct.successed | 汇兑分发指令处理成功. Return data `FxInstructInfo` object. |
| fxinstruct.failed | 汇兑分发指令处理失败. Return data `FxInstructInfo` object. |
